about-me.headline: About me
about-me.aboutme_text: I got into programming through gaming. But it was only when I started implementing my own projects that I realized how much fun I really enjoy it.
about-me.location_text: I am currently in the Dresden area, more specifically in the small town of Coswig. However, I am planning to move to Freiberg in the first half of 2026, which is why a remote position would be perfect for me.
about-me.bulb_text: I learned a lot during my course at the Developer Academy and am excited to see what else I can learn through my daily work as a programmer.
about-me.puzzle_text: I am quite persistent when it comes to problem solving, which allows me to find unconventional solutions. If I still cannot find a solution, I openly ask for help in the form of explanations.

skills.headline: My Skills
skills.text_1: This list contains all the front-end skills I have learned so far.
skills.text_3: I'm curious. What else will be added here?

portfolio.headline_text: Here is a selection of my best projects – ready to test with just one click!
portfolio.join_text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.el_dragonnoid_text: A simple jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help El Dragonnoid find treasure and food to fight the magician.
portfolio.pokedex_text: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

reviews.review_1: Michael really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
reviews.review_2: Michi was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals.
reviews.review_3: It was a great pleasure to work with Michael. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm. Regarding the well-being of group members, he was always present and available to listen and help others, with a great sense of humor as well.
